title: How to Clean Filters With Vinegar

steps.headline: Create a vinegar mixture.
steps.description: Mix together equal parts white distilled vinegar and warm water.

steps.headline: Remove the filter.
steps.description: Soak the filter in the vinegar and warm water mixture. Leave it to soak for 60 minutes.

steps.headline: Squeeze dry.
steps.description: Gently squeeze the filter dry after removing from the soak. Allow to air-dry before replacing in the equipment.

tyn: Bucket or large container for mixing and soaking
text: Create a vinegar mixture. Mix together equal parts white distilled vinegar and warm water. Remove the filter. Soak the filter in the vinegar and warm water mixture. Leave it to soak for 60 minutes. Squeeze dry. Gently squeeze the filter dry after removing from the soak. Allow to air-dry before replacing in the equipment.
sentences: Mix together equal parts white distilled vinegar and warm water.
Soak the filter in the vinegar and warm water mixture.
Leave it to soak for 60 minutes.
Gently squeeze the filter dry after removing from the soak.
Allow to air-dry before replacing in the equipment.
